snippet: As many as 18,000 nurses went on strike Tuesday and picketed in front of Kaiser Permanente facilities in Northern California over concerns about patient-care standards and Ebola.
abstract: As many as 18,000 nurses go on strike and picket in front of Kaiser Permanente facilities in Northern California over concerns about patient-care standards and Ebola.
lead_paragraph: As many as 18,000 nurses went on strike Tuesday and picketed in front of Kaiser Permanente facilities in Northern California over concerns about patient-care standards and Ebola.
